body:
Hey guys this is my very first video.
This is just a intro video just to tell you what is happening in my channel.
Sorry for the water mark it will be removed soon. Anyway here it is - 
https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCnf7xaAqwrWVuXAVFDbjLXg
Thanks! Matt

replies.body:
That's the intro I used to use a few months ago! ^o^
Good luck with making your videos. If you have any questions about thumbnails / commentating / creating content, or any general video making / editing questions, you can ask me! :D
